node.title: Person seriously injured after suspected fall off RƒÅpaki Rock
node.description: One person is in a serious condition in Christchurch Hospital after a suspected fall in the city's Port Hills.
node.content:
["One person is in a serious condition in Christchurch Hospital after a suspected fall in the city's Port Hills.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Claire Eastham-Farrelly\n
", "St Johns Ambulance responded to the incident just before midday at R\u0101paki Rock, a popular climbing spot.", "A fire crew also responded, helping to transport the patient to an ambulance waiting on the road below.", "R\u0101paki Rock has a reputation of injuries and even death in the past.", "In November 2019, Paul Corridon died while attempting a climb on the rock, which resulted in a coronial inquiry earlier this year."]
